alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 27 at 8:22PM MST until February 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...East Platte County including Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Glendo. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.
